# remote Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "remote" {
  max_sessions = 2
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **max_sessions** (Number) Maximum number of open sessions in each host connection. Defaults to `3`.
